BackstoryDef.title: tragic experiment
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] volunteered for an experiment that was attempting to give all of the skills of a super-powered being into the head of a baseliner human. Unfortunately, the human brain was not intended to process information at the rate of a super, and everyone in the experiment either died, or became increasingly unstable.

BackstoryDef.title: abandoned lab experiment
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of an experiment to create an uncontrollable super-soldier with the intention of being dropped into an enemy encampment, where [PAWN_pronoun] would fight everyone around [PAWN_objective] until they died, or killed everyone in the area. The experiment was abandoned due to ethical concerns, but [PAWN_nameDef] and the other experiments were not evacuated beforehand. [PAWN_nameDef] survived until the next ship arrived by eating the other experiments, and eventually had to flee the ship [PAWN_pronoun] was escaping on due to uncontrollable bloodlust.

BackstoryDef.title: mad genius
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] caught a glimpse of something extraordinary within an archotech structure. [PAWN_pronoun] became obsessed with it, spending every waking moment thinking of new ways to reach the pinnacle of science.

BackstoryDef.title: shadowy assassin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained by a group of assassins to become a weapon that didn't even need to be nearby to kill a target. This training resulted in [PAWN_objective] having difficulties interacting with others in a less violent way.

BackstoryDef.title: world eater
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] stumbled on an archotech structure that held within it an artifact with the schematics for a world ending weapon. Unfortunately for [PAWN_nameDef], just coming into contact with it permanently damaged [PAWN_possessive] brain, leaving [PAWN_objective] obsessed with finding a way to remember those schematics, or at the very least a way to create new ones.

BackstoryDef.title: mad scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has an obsession with discovering new things that would be classified as unhealthy. For [PAWN_nameDef], their work is all that matters, and just the idea of sitting still makes them even twitchier.

BackstoryDef.title: vengeful one
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked with a team of supers, and they worked quite well together despite how different [PAWN_pronoun] was from the rest of them. That all changed when some of the team decided to betray the everyone, leading to [PAWN_nameDef] beginning a quest of neverending vengence against the traitors who escaped. With most of [PAWN_possessive] teamates dead by the hands of those [PAWN_pronoun] thought of as friends, [PAWN_pronoun] vowed to never leave [PAWN_objective]self in a position where this could happen again.
